arts.ttl: Rice and Saka send Arsenal top with win over West Ham
arts.sum: Declan Rice scored against his former club as Arsenal moved top of the Premier League with a comfortable 2-0 win over West Ham.

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Arsenal vs West Ham United
arts.sum: West Ham are looking to become only the second side ever to win three consecutive Premier League away games against Arsenal, after Manchester City. The Gunners havenâ€™t beaten West Ham in their last three league meetings, but confidence is high after an impressive away victory at Newcastle and a solid midweek performance in the Champions League.
